name: A Cats Journey (RainXCat)
description:
hi, i am in 3 day strike journey of making this game, my first game jam!

"A Cats Journey"

i like cats so i thought this will be great as i can pixel art this, there are many thing's remaining, i am thinking of making boss fight tomorrow and a new level!!

if you guys have any comments please say and enjoy!!

game play keys:

arrow keys or awsd and spacebar

bugs gonna fix: moving platform, spawning of fishes
